mapper.insert: insert into cart(cartid , usersid , foodsid , price , num , addtime ) values(#{cartid} , #{usersid} , #{foodsid} , #{price} , #{num} , #{addtime} )
mapper.update: update cart set usersid=#{usersid} , foodsid=#{foodsid} , price=#{price} , num=#{num} , addtime=#{addtime} where cartid=#{cartid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username , c.foodsname , c.image from cart a , users b , foods c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.foodsid = c.foodsid order by cartid desc
select a.* , b.username , c.foodsname , c.image from cart a , users b , foods c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.foodsid = c.foodsid and cartid=#{cartid} order by cartid desc

select a.* , b.username , c.foodsname , c.image from cart a , users b , foods c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.foodsid = c.foodsid
and b.username like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{usersid}, '%'))
and c.foodsname like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{foodsid}, '%'))
and a.price like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{price}, '%'))
and a.num like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{num}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
